amendment.description: To require institutions of higher education to submit attestations on freedom of speech.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1911 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 207.

action.text: Amendment SA 1911 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3470-3471, S3476-3477; text: CR S3471) To require institutions of higher education to submit attestations on freedom of speech.
